name: Shyvan's Dream (Demo)
description:
This is the demo/preview of  Shyvan's Dream. 

Core concepts:

You earn gold by killing monsters. If you kill enough monsters, you can buy heros.

You have a limited amount of heros available. Buy new Slots by pressing the +-Button in the hero selection screen. Items can be dragged and dropped from the inventory into the slots. 

If an item is dropped you can inspect by hovering over them. Press F to take to item, press t to trash them.

Spells are always picked up, if dropped. A Spell-Tooltip will follow soon.

Most heros come with a set spell at their first spell slot. This spell cannot be exchanged.

Use the forge to reforge bad items.
